mapper.select: SELECT l.*, CASE WHEN a.road_nm_bubun = 0 THEN CONCAT(a.road_nm, ' ', a.road_nm_bonbun) ELSE CONCAT(a.road_nm, ' ', a.road_nm_bonbun, '-', a.road_nm_bubun) END AS roadAddress FROM listing l JOIN address_mapping a ON l.address_mapping_id = a.id WHERE l.address_mapping_id = #{addressMappingId};
mapper.update: UPDATE listing SET image_path = #{imagePath}, address_mapping_id = #{addressMappingId}, apt_dong = #{aptDong}, description = #{description}, username = #{username} WHERE id = #{id}
